Key Match Events: Traore (35', 38') scored a brace, Bande (60' pen.) scored a penalty for Burkina Faso, Simpore (29') scored for Malawi, Nkhoma (80') scored for Malawi, Chaziya (59') scored for Malawi
Pre-Game Insights: Burkina Faso have a strong defensive and midfield spine that is likely to be unchanged, Malawi have a fully-fit squad to pick from
Post-Match Reflections: Burkina Faso were buoyed by their last-gasp equaliser against Senegal, Malawi have now only won one of their last six games in all competitions
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burkina Faso sit in third and are five points behind table-toppers Egypt, Malawi have a crucial uphill task to guide their side above any one of Tunisia, Namibia or Liberia in their quest for 2026's showcase tournament
